main event: A sighting of a brilliant white object resembling a star occurred in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a dime and estimated to be traveling at 1000 mph.,The object displayed no altitude changes while moving side to side until it disappeared.,The sighting lasted for 3 minutes.,The observer was a traveling salesman with aviation experience.,The object was observed in clear daylight conditions.
sighted object: a brilliant white object resembling a star
witness description: traveling salesman, ex-naval aviator with 2000 logged hours
